header.author: Dr. Bohadsch
header.title: An Account of Dr. Bohadsch's Treatise, Communicated to the Royal Society, Intituled, Dissertatio Philosophico-Medica de Utilitate Electrisationis in Curandis Morbis, Printed at Prague 1751: Extracted and Translated from the Latin by Mr. Wm. Watson, F. R. S.
